name: Phil's School 2
description:
Mr. Phil is back at it again! However, he's wants to play tag with you. Something doesn't feel right. Can you escape Phil's School (again...) by collecting all the keys for the locked doors?

WASD to move, SPACE to interact, hold R to run, 0 for map, arrow keys to move camera.

Sneaky Action by Fesliyan Studios, intercom track by Micah McGonical, "Danger Ahead!" by me. This is a Baldi's Basics Classic fangame, Baldi's Basics was created by mystman12.
